name: set_context
description: Set the working context path for a session

path.description: Directory path to set as context

name: list_directory
description: List directory contents with session context support and gitignore awareness

path.description: Directory path to list (absolute or relative to session context)

session_id.description: Optional session identifier for context. Defaults to 'default'

include_gitignore.description: Include files normally ignored by gitignore. Defaults to false

pattern.description: Optional glob pattern to filter results (e.g., '*.rs', 'src/**/*.ts'). Respects gitignore rules.
